titles.title: Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial Act
To designate a Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial at Riverside National Cemetery in Riverside, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 10/3/2002--Introduced. Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial Act - Designates the memorial to former prisoners of war and members of the armed forces missing in action that is under construction at Riverside National Cemetery, California, as the Prisoner of War/Missing in Action National Memorial.
